Now produce output with double braces.assistantfinal{{"summary":"This module provides a comprehensive suite of unit tests for the Lightning command‑line interface (CLI) and its related utilities. It defines lightweight data modules and models used in the tests and verifies CLI behavior such as argument parsing, configuration file handling, logger shortcut arguments, optimizer and learning‑rate scheduler integration, distributed strategy options, early‑exit handling, hyperparameter saving, and error conditions. The tests ensure that the CLI correctly creates trainers, models, and data modules, respects defaults and overrides, and works with various logging backends and environments.","business_intent":"Validate that the Lightning CLI functions reliably across diverse configurations, logging backends, optimizers, schedulers, and distributed settings, providing confidence that users can launch training jobs via the command line without issues.","keywords":["lightning","cli","test","argparse","config","logger","optimizer","scheduler","distributed","ddp","callbacks","hyperparameters","save config","environment","data module","model","seed","profiler","tensorboard","wandb","comet","neptune","torch","pytorch"]
